content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 2340 friday 6.27.14. i was watching tv and was preparing to go to bed when i walked by west facing windows at the front of our house. looking outside i noticed a large orange object moving slowly near my location. the orange glow immediately peaked my interest so i walked out the front door onto our loop driveway. i then noticed that there were a total of 4 orange glowing objects. the one approaching from the south was closest and largest while the other three were moving on a northward track with some distance between them. 
as the closest object was temporarily obscured by a tree i watched the other three; as i did one took a 45 degree more west track away from the others and moved away at a higher rate of speed. as it did so it cast an orange glow on the clouds. after entering the clouds (the cloud ceiling looked relatively low this night) the clouds filtered the glow and i could see the object was circular. or at least from my perspective the object looked flat on the bottom and round in shape. this was the only object that i could get any distinguishable shape; as the orange glow made the objects look like orbs while on video they looked like triangles.
i continued to watch all four of these objects disappear either over the horizon or because of moving out of sight through the clouds. as i continued to watch two more large orange objects approached from the south. i watched and took video of some of these as they cleared the area. 
i was excited at this point because it was clear to me that the objects were not commercial or any known military aircraft. so i went back into the house and awoke my wife and had her join me outside. we waited about 10-15 minutes and i was about to give up when suddenly another large orange object began to approach from the south. it was soon joined by another. we both observed both of these objects move from south to north; and videotaped them as they progressed. i continued observing the sky for another 30-45 minutes and did not see any further objects. after 15 minutes or more i briefly noticed a strong burning odor but cannot directly attribute it to the objects.
these objects had a very distinct orange glow. they made no sounds as they moved across the sky. one peculiar observation is that louisville ky is a ups hub. between 2300 and 0100 the skies are consistently full of aircraft. during the whole event and up to 30 minutes after i did not see or hear any aircraft. it was as if the area was kept clear of traffic.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange glowing objects near louisville ky 6.28.14

content.detailedDescription:
Cigar shaped ufo is on fire, covered in flames, black military helicopter respondant on scene hovering. a flashing yellow light appears and some sort of portal opens, the cigar shaped ufo  flies in and portal seals shut with a brilliant flash, black helicopter flies away.   

i was driving in my car late at night to get to my dirt road residence when i thought i had seen a missile. i slam on brakes and jump out of my car. i was shocked and frightened, i wasnt sure if ww3 had started or not cause i thought it was a missile launch.

it was a cigar shaped ufo with narrow strip of  windows? down the side, flames were licking at it, 2/3rds of it was on fire. 
i wasnt sure whether to stare at the ufo or the black helicopter on scene or  the flash of yellow light that opened up a hole in the night sky. 

looking for artist  to recreate and volunteer services to find peace of mind. willing to take lie detector test if anyone in doubt. psychologically effected and  feel alone and frightened cause this is my third sighting in two years time.(2008-2009) no sightings since.  i am seeking more answers, reassurance. 

happy to share. this happened in 2008.
content.summary: Portal , cigar ufo on  fire in   distress,   flew thru portal. helicopter witness

content.detailedDescription: I used google earth on my computer and put marina del rey in search and found these images. it looks like someone with a 400 foot wide lawnmower mowed the ocean floor row after row. most telling are the 180 degree semicircle tracks that appear at the row end as when one would turn around to make the next row. other spots are where  san fransisco bay opens to the ocean. here we see not only precise geometric rows but also a perimeter boundary precisely angled. are the many fuzzy circles we see ufos airbrushed over? other areas are san diego, palos verdes estates. in the monterey-seaside area are what appear like saucers and a cigar sittng on the prepared ocean floor. the pics i submjtted were taken directly from my computer and not included are pics of nasca like lines underwater on a global scale.
content.summary: Ufo underwater base off marina del rey

content.detailedDescription:
Again, being an avid sky watcher i was out in the back yard waiting to see the 'camel' meteor shower and was about to go back to the house when i noticed 3 orange/yellow globes approaching from the east. the first 3 were in a triangular formation, then 3 more followed in-line one after the other, then another came after the straight 3, and finally 1 more approached. they all 'turned-off' as they came overhead. their speed was similar to a small prop plane. i called another person to view what i had seen but she only saw the last 2 objects. they made no noise and traveled at the same speed. i had my zhumell 20 x 80 power binoculars with me and viewed the last object before it went out. after the light went out i saw a grayish object continue in the same direction (west). initially i thought they were 'chinese lanterns' but they were moving against a 5 mile an hour wind from the west. at that point i had no idea what they might be. unidentified, yes...For sure. one more item, they were below the partly cloudy sky. for the most part, it was almost a clear night, except for some random passing clouds. i would estimate about 500/700 feet.
more people should be aware of the sky and not be afraid to report what they see. i have seen many unusual objects traversing the night sky and i will report them when i see them.
content.summary: 7 sphere shaped orange

content.detailedDescription: I used google earth on my computer and put marina del rey in search and found these images. it looks like someone with a 400 foot wide lawnmower mowed the ocean floor row after row. most telling are the 180 degree semicircle tracks that appear at the row end as when one would turn around to make the next row. other spots are where  san fransisco bay opens to the ocean. here we see not only precise geometric rows but also a perimeter boundary precisely angled. are the many fuzzy circles we see ufos airbrushed over? other areas are san diego, palos verdes estates. in the monterey-seaside area are what appear like saucers and a cigar sittng on the prepared ocean floor. the pics i submjtted were taken directly from my computer and not included are pics of nasca like lines underwater on a global scale.
content.summary: Ufo underwater base off marina del rey

content.detailedDescription: About 8:15 pm the sunday after the marathon bomber was caught in 2013. i went outside to take in the usa flag as i looked up to grab it .I saw something strange in the sky .I live not far from logan airport , i see a lot of different aircraft when logan uses a certain landing strip i see the planes going from my left to right when i look towards the north east and fairly low and can hear them they are about a mile away from me , they fly over the neponset river to logan. this flying object i saw a was brownish v shape but the front was flat the point of the v was on the inside and 3 large red domed lights 1 in front and 1 at each end. it was going from my right to left slowly , it flew level and then would drop straight down a little , it did that 3 times then took a sharp 90 degree turn to its right and vanished , like it disappeared ,the sky was clear but milky white way off in the horizon . at the same time planes were landing  as i said from my left to right this craft was bigger than the planes and was higher but not real high and a good deal further away a half mile or so. its hard to judge the distance. i have no idea of the hight of the planes i see as they fly by my house but low enough where i can see the windows and sometimes the airline name but can not see in the plane to far away for that , also can see landing gear. also at the same time were 3 large 4 engine jets way up they were tiny and had con trails 2 where flying fairly close to each other going from my right to left as if going away from logan but further away from the the v object , and the other going from my left to right. like i said the object kind of disappeared and the other jets just kept going in their original direction. my reaction and feelings ? i walked out to the street , i was amazed at what i was looking at . to this day i really feel like i more than likely saw a ufo . i really don't believe it was a drone , this thing was very big
content.summary: Brown v shape flat nose 3 redish lights 1 @ each end 1 infront flew level and dropped straight down 3 times then a 90degree sharp turn to iys right maybe west of boston

content.detailedDescription: just got home about 8:30 p.M. and went out to water my tomatoes in the back yard, and the ufo appeared, this is not the first time, i have seen it about a month ago it was reported by some more neighbors in the same area with in a 1/4 mile of my house, it is reported on your site. it hovered over my house for about 3 minutes and was moving from north east to straight north,it was a sold silver and white glowing object no sound or smoke coming from it. i told my wife to come out here and look at it and she did she said why does this keep coming to our area.She said it might come down here some day.  i said maybe and we can get a closer look. we went to the front yard to water the flowers and found a crop circle in my front yard about 30ft. in diameter, it had to have just happened, i mowed the yard today and it was not there. i know there are ufo's i have seen them before in other area's with in 50 miles of where i live, also my wife has witnessed these with me.I have a picture of the crop circle in my yard it is a different color than the rest of the yard. we had one about 8 years ago in the front yard the same size it finally went away but the grass still won't grow right there any more. i don't know if it matters or not but here about 3 weeks or so ago three was 3 stealth plains circled this area for about 45 minutes for no reason and my neighbor and i wondered why they just kept circling here, maybe a training exercise but that was a few days after we saw the first ufo, their government is not going to tell the truth anyway, you know how they are about ufo's they think everybody is stupid, but some of us know better regardless of what they say. the pictures are here for you to see.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over house for about 3 minutes then desending to the north  crop circle in yard  still here i ahve picture

content.detailedDescription: On june 26th 2014 my husband and i were outside enjoying the night air in late evening. it was a bright night with many stars. we noticed a bright moving ���star��� moving across the sky northward in a straight line as far out as the other stars., suddenly stopped in the middle of the sky directly above our line of site. it did not move after it stopped��� it stood completely still like a normal star for the entire time  which was about 20 minutes and we went inside.
content.summary: Bright star like thing moving quickly straight across sky, then stopped directly above us. did not move just continued to look like brightest star.

content.detailedDescription:
I went on the balcony to smoke a cigarette at around 2:10 a.M. eastern. the apartment is on the third floor south of the city of charleston past johns island and toward savannah. maybe 10 miles from downtown charleston.

scanned the night sky and spotted what appeared to be a stationary ufo with lights. object did not move.  woke up my wife to witness the oddity.   it was obvious it was a ufo. had blue and red lights.  white.  disappeared briefly once around 2:25 a.M.  then returned. just disappeared with no discernible movement. 

a plane came in from the north and flew relatively high over the object until the plane was off my radar.  

shortly after the plane was out of sight, the ufo simply vanished.

shot two cell phone photos but the object wasn't in the photo.
content.summary: Ufo sighted near charleston, sc

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine took several photos at the rodos airport and in one of the photos we saw this sphere like object above one stationed airplane
content.summary: Rodos airport ufo

content.detailedDescription: We were driving a little after midnight on nevada 6e, i believe near fish lake, but in any case 12 miles west of the intersection of 6e and 95.  i and my companion both observed a streak of light that started as a trace in mid-sky and then suddenly flashed into a ball  of very bright blue-white light. as if first a string had appeared and then a yo-yo is another way to describe it.  about the size of a fingernail at arm's length, it did not strike us as the right color, speed, or size for a "shooting star." then everything went black. i.E., the "string" appeared first, then the "ball", then both were visible at the same time at the moment of the bright flash, then instantly both went dark. we're reporting this only in case others saw anything unusual and this would serve as corroboration.
content.summary: Large bright-blue white light seemed to fall abruptly toward ground

content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken by mike eaddy. asked me to see if i could get any details from the original file. i did not witness the sighting. photo was taken while setting camera for night photography. mike did not see the objects at that time, only when the picture was reviewed the next day. i enhanced a copy using astrophotography techniques to try and identify. highly unusual characteristics -  what appears to be a vapor or atmospheric distortion. 6th smaller light is a blown pixel - disregard. please send this copy to a photo analyst. - am/pm reversed in camera setup.
i have mike eaddy's permission to distribute.
content.summary: Objects noticed after checking photo

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance & i where vacationing at north myrtle beach, sc. sitting on the balcony, talking. right in the middle of a sentence, i saw about 5 lights, light up 1 after another, in a circular pattern. i said "do you see that" & she did. it disappeared fast, but she was able to catch it. these round orange lights continued to show up all over the sky, only over the ocean, but not above the clouds, or below. they would appear for about 5 seconds on average, then vanish. right in the middle of the cloud line. this was on the 23rd of june 2014. it lasted about an hour.
on the 24th we saw nothing all night. 
on the 25th we saw it again, & this is the night i took the photo. i tried & tried to get them on video, & they weren't showing up, but only had the phone camera. i only got the 1 clean shot, after zooming in. it was like as soon as i put my phone down they would show up on queue. very frustrating! same as the previous night, it went on, but on this night until about 1am.
on the 26th was the wildest night. my fiance was joking around, cause i kept saying "there's another, over there, etc" so she was mocking me, & directly in front of us, still over the water though, was around 20 lights, they did the circular pattern as they lit up, but they were doubled up this time. 1 over top of each other, & lighting up 2 at a time. then they were all staying lit a little longer than normal. about 3 more appear just left of the 20 or so straight ahead & they floated toward each other. it looked like they joined together right before they disappeared. again they would show up periodically for about an hour & it was over. 
as far as my emotions... when i saw it i automatically thought, that's not normal. during i thought what am i witnessing, & is anyone else seeing this but us? after, i feel like we are not alone!
content.summary: Orange lights single & multiple, over the ocean, 23rd, 25th, & 26th of june 2014. from 10 until @least 11 each night

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke i was out there for a few minutes looking towards the sky we have a great view of the sky out here and i look at the stars on a regular basis if we don't have cloud cover. after a few minutes a very bright bright ball of light caught my eye similar to a star but much closer and much brighter the light seemed to grow stronger until suddenly just disappeared. i wasn't sure what it was i even thought well if its a plane i should see the strobe lights i kept waiting to see some more indication that maybe it was some sort of aircraft which we don't have much of over here. but as i was keeping my eye out for strobes it showed back up in the same exact spot and did the exact same thing. the interval from when i first seen it to the second time was maybe a minute to a minute and a half. the second time it did the exact same thing it radiated a very bright white phosphorus type light and just vanished. i waited outside for quite awhile after and never seen it again. it was similar to possibly a flare or a firework as far as the type of light it was emitting, however it didn't move when it was lit up and it showed up in the exact same area i seen it the first time it appeared. i don't know i've never believed in ufo's but i really don't have any other explanation for what i saw.
content.summary: I seen a very bright white phosphorus light in the sky that just appeared then instantly was gone then reappeared in exact same spot then disappeared again both times seem to be visible for approx 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on porch with wife and noticed light coming across sky in direction of plane however the light not blinking with red and blue green glow backed up and descinded moved to right dropped again below horizon .  at it's backward descent my wife took video of it   couple minutes later reappeared low on horizon and vanished

.Can post video if requested
content.summary: Blue green light moving across sky like a plane but had no blinking light changed direction backward and down quick

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:27 pm i was taking out the trash. looking up i saw a brightly colored object of green and red. the colors were very pronounced and did not seem to fade together but separated. it reminded me of approaching boat navigational lights (green-left and red-right). the object was motionless for a few seconds. because it was bigger and brighter than any aircraft, i took a picture and video with my cell phone. it then moved quickly north-west, stopped and then even quicker back south west disappearing behind trees. the movement nw from stationary was about two hands width at arm extension and double that when it quickly turned sw. the entire sighting was about 30-45 seconds.

i later checked picture and video from my phone and found picture, although small, to be interesting. when picture is zoomed there is a definite color variation (the object is near center of frame). the 18 second video was disappointing as i saw no trace of lights (may have covered lens in the excitement??)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright object with very distinct green and red colors seperated

content.detailedDescription:
On the 26 of june 2014 at approximately 2230-2240hrs i was in my back yard which faces north setting up my telescope for a night of observing.

as i was aligning the telescope i noticed a bright orange light traveling south towards my location. it is not uncommon to see aircraft with landing lights heading in this direction however as i kept watching it appeared to be moving at a high rate of speed and in a southern direction. as it passed it remained the same orange colour  from front to back and i was not able to see any aircraft marking strobe lights. i also was not able to hear any noise from the object as it passed. 

thinking little of it i continued to set up my telescope however a few seconds later i observed another orange light, of the same size following the same flight path followed a few seconds later by a second orange craft just to the west, this second craft appeared to be catching up to the first slightly.

i was able to take a picture of the second object as it passed overhead and disappeared when it was blocked by the houses.

seconds later another object appeared again following the same flight path. i was able to get a video with my cell phone of this object. in the video it looks like there are two craft as one is bouncing around the other however there was only one and the second light must have been a reflection in the eyepiece of the camera. also the video makes the craft appear to shake, this was caused by me moving in the back yard trying to capture it as long as i could before it disappeared behind the houses.

i have lived in this area for almost 10 years and have an interest in aviation and familiar with aircraft flying overhead, i have never observed anything similar to these lights. further from this area i have seen many satellites including several passes of the international space station. these objects were  much larger and brighter than any satellite i have seen and as a speed reference i would say they were moving twice as fast as the iss would travel. further the light remained consistent on all of the objects as they passed by.
content.summary: Orange glowing objects seen over east ottawa canada

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and i always look up at the stars. saw a bright orange light. it was stationary then wobbled a little and completely disappeared. strange indeed.
content.summary: I saw a bright orange light. it was stationary for a couple of seconds then kind of wobbled and completely disappeared. i've seen fireballs before and this was not one of them.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 27, 2012, i was looking off my 12 floor balcony toward the east facing downtown manila from mall of asia (moa), and saw a round metallic sphere coming from the east. the sphere stopped about a mile north of manila international airport and a mile east of manila bay at approximately 1,200 feet in the air. the object hovered for approximately 35 to 45 minutes then slowly retreated back to the east in a slow yet deliberate manner without changing altitude or making any erratic changes. the object continued moving east without making any sounds or leaving exhaust until i could not see it any longer. my wife saw the object as well and if you google the date, you will find that others also saw it.

the two images were not taken by me or on the date of my sighting, however it is the same object in the same location performing the same way according to the witness one year earlier...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Metallic ball seen above manila

content.detailedDescription:
10:15 pm took one dog out and leashed to porch.  stood looking into  the sky as always.  looking for jets that constantly fly over.  sometimes have counted 6 to 8 jets in the area.  look at stars as well.  this time an object orb like in structure flashed and the light stayed on several secs, which i knew right away wasn't aircraft because it wasn't normal color and it wasn't the white and red or blue that i usually see nor was it strobe like.  the object headed nw terrific speed,  i say once it flashed and went out it traveled some distance and it flashed again but this time it was very brilliant.  no way you could miss it.  there were clouds not heavy you could still see stars and jets, but the strange thing was as it disappeared into a cloud it flashed it but this time it made a turn that is impossible.  it actually made an arch back the same way it came but towards my direct, then turned again into the clouds and met with second object. same orb like structure, it flashed once when both met and both flew nw in same direction.  this all happened between 10:15 - 10:35
as for feelings was  astonished and amazed by the maneuverability.  lost after both entered cloud cover.
first when i seen thought plane, but no noise being that low, and lights weren't strobing and the incredible speed it was moving.
i could draw a pic of an orb like structure but again that was the shape of the light that flashed as for craft you couldn't make it out, not like when you see a jet at night you can  tell what it is before you hear and once close you know.  this wasn't like that.
  honestly this isn't the first time i ever seen a ufo, but i never reported them why now you ask, figured why not get it recorded, maybe someone else out there seen it as well.  yes i beleive in ufo's, and i'm a religious franciscan brother, no it doesn't effect my faith.
content.summary: Took dogs out looked into sky as usual object caught my vision moving fast l to r

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving down the road and noticed people staring and pointing into the sky.
3. my brother thought it was a flair and i thought it was a chinese lantern, so i pulled over . it was hovering for a minute. then it started moving. and i thought it was cool to see a ufo around here. 
6. the object started heading south pretty fast.
content.summary: Bright glowing orange, very large object compared to stars or planets

content.detailedDescription:
As usual when i am watching the clouds,
i found some clouds fascinating to observe and started taking photos to share with friends and family. out of nowhere this object appeared and stayed long enough for me to photograph it. i was a little spooked because i had just shared a photo with you today of a similar object seen earlier this month. however, that's the story. there is a component to this that is disturbing- or unearthly, should i say. these objects seem to me to have a personality or a presence.
content.summary: It just appearing, shot back and forth, then disappeared suddenly without returning.

content.detailedDescription: I was out at this wildlife refuge with my girlfriend and we decided to stay for a bit after the sun went down to enjoy the night sky. we were laying on top of our truck when all of a sudden this bright speck of light appeared in the northeast.At first i thought it was a star that was covered from the clouds, but when it brightened up more and started to pulsate, it threw me off completely. it hovered up, then made a "c" motion. immediately i knew what we were both looking at and i couldnt believe my eyes. i got up and once i called it out, the object reacted as if it knew we noticed it. right after i asked my girlfriend if she's seeing this too, it started to come towards us. i jumped off truck and yelled to get inside the truck. i felt so vulnerable and i was honestly scared for our lives. i drove off trying to get to the main road and while i was driving i looked out the window and i saw the object following us to the left side of me. it was  triangular shaped, three lights. i looked back to the dirt road so i wouldnt crash and once we reached the main road, i stopped and stepped outside the truck to take a look. it was gone. i couldn't help but to freak out and hyperventilate.. i coyldnt comprehend what had just happened. like this is something that comes out in movies. i kept looking up to see if any lights would be around, but nothing. then my girlfriend noticed that down the dirt road behind us there was this glow, right where we were parked at first. we asked each other what we should do until a bright orb-like object appeared and right there and then i told myself that i had seen enough. we hit the main road and headed straight home.
content.summary: Bright object appeared in the sky and started to come towards me.

content.detailedDescription:
First sighting of object (or objects) 2011
first time seen always at night in a parking lot looking due southeast.  object never moved, always white in appearance as outline and one red center light (lights in 2011 were solid across).  6 months later, they disappeared.

second sighting of object (or objects) 2013
same location in the sky and same parking lot looking due southeast
each night i noticed the object was different in shape and i video taped it this time.  within 3 months that followed, object disappeared again
after posting my video on youtube, other people came forward and said they saw the object and it wasn't a building.  

note the following facts:

a hospital is 1 to 2 miles away in the same direction, but the lights don't resemble any colors i have seen.

when the lights disappeared, i went to the hospital and their lighted signs were still lit.  

last sighting was in december 11, 2013

object was video taped from 2 locations, one on either side of the street where i always saw the lights.  i can't upload the video because my computer isn't fast enough.  i will send you images or a copy by mail but i could not upload the video i've made.

my personal conclusion:

either it's a ufo or a temperature inversion

i hope you will investigate.

thanks for your time,

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Stationary object seen over 3 years time

content.detailedDescription: My neighbor and myself were at the end of our driveway watching her son walk down to his friends house. it was about 8:40 pm. we started to walk back when my neighbor spotted something strange in the night sky. it was a strange red glowing light and moving rather oddly. while we were watching the ufo we also noticed a plane in the area flying towards the ufo but still some distance away. the ufo was descending from it's original position then moving to its left, right, then would slightly ascend all the while the red light would brighten then dim. i snapped a few photos then tried to video record it. during my 30 second video it dimmed then disappeared. there was also a storm about to roll in from the west... you could barely see the clouds lighting up in the west.
content.summary: Red glowing object flying in odd directional pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't know what to make of it. it was too distant for me to feel any connection with it but it was definitely there, performing a kind of dance that no man made object could perform. also, the shimmering shade of green was unlike any i had ever seen. the iphone photo i have attached it not clear but if you look closely you can see the object. file 1 i included by accident. file 2 is the photo i intended to share.
my feelings are ambivalent- this is the second ufo
i have observed. the first, encountered in the mid-sixties in salem, oregon was very close, just hovering motionless above the trees surrounding our house. it was metallic and i was very surprised.  i felt immediately that whatever or whoever it was wanted me to come with
it. i was horrified. then it rose abruptly and joined another ufo which appeared out of nowhere and the two of flew off in tandem at a terrific rate of speed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Suddenly materialized while i was photographing clouds. it appeared as a shimmering pale green color which shifted in shape from round to somewhat conical. it hovered, then shifted around erratically in different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I was abducted at the age of 13 in oak cliff, texas while staying with my grandparents in august of 1965.
when i woke up around 3:30 to 4:00 am i was vomiting with a strange smell of anesthesia.  being 13 years old, i had just started my period the month before and when i stood up, there was a large blood clot that fell onto the floor. 
my grandmother ran to get a cup towel and put it on me like a diaper.
i was never the same again, yet i have learned to surrender to the process and the mufon professionals!
there have been multiple dreams and visions throughout my life of a female that resembled myself yet was clearly not human. downloads have continued to this very day!
i have no memory of the ship that abducted me, just the results of the abduction. there were multiple witnesses of a ufo on hampton blvd that august of 1965.  i was abducted on oak cliff blvd, two streets over from hampton blvd.
i would like to speak to anyone who has had a similar experience.
content.summary: I was abducted at age of 13 in oak cliff texas. after one period i woke up vomiting and passed a big blood clot onto the floor and was never the same again.

content.detailedDescription:
While standing in my pool cleaning it holding a 16ft. metallic pole, i felt like 'static' electricity on my skin. i thought the air was electrified by possible storm.  i looked up and noticed a brilliant light, traveling faster than a plane, from east to west then south west. 

the sky was clear blue, daylight,  with scattered clouds.  the light passed through the clouds at one point, where i lost sight of it, but expected it to come out in a straight line at the other end,  but it shifted a few degrees to the south west.

i watched it  against the blue sky  till it disappeared.  it was fast, at cloud cover level, bright, larger than a star.  oval shaped, like a pill as i got a good look when it was directly overhead.

i am a military veteran, familiar with low flying aircraft.  it was not a commercial plane, no wings.  it was not a fighter jet. it was silent. it was solid.  it was very fast.  

i got out of the water to get my phone to take a picture in the event it appeared again, or more  followed, i had to press several times to get my screen to appear.  i thought the battery died.

i wanted to take note of the time.  i noticed the time on it changed 12 minutes back after i went inside to get this laptop to write up my thoughts. 

when i saw the time difference between my laptop and phone, that prompted me to file this mufon report.
content.summary: Brilliant, fast moving light, oval shaped, speeding from east to west to south west, daylight, cloud level, cell phone clock lost 12 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Thank you......Never thought about ufo's as a reality or existence.....On my 2nd floor backporch looking east towards my alley....& facing lake michigan about 2 1/2 -3 miles to lakefront. my girlfriend saw this too...I was on porch watching her bring garbage to the alley garbage cans....Suddenly, with no planes, helicopters, etc. in sky........ a 'team" of orange colored lights.... [ approx. 12-15] distinctly formed & separate from each other started from the lowest point to be seen from my 2nd fl. porch of my 2 flat...& continued asending straight up in the sky.... after a moment my mind was saying.. what?!?..... as these continued going straight up, my girlfriend was walking back from the garbage can in my wide open back yard....& i yelled 30 feet to her, "honey look up!..What is that"?.......She turned & looked to see these separate masses.....& for 3-4 seconds more they kept their path...& suddenly then.....They at warp speed spread apart & vanished in thin air separating basically to the n.....S.......Nw.....& sw........At the same time!....I immediately blurted out to her......Those were ufo's!!!....... please try to look up this event,....Because the next morning i asked  my next door neighbor if he had seen this....He said no.....But he ended up looking [it] up & sent me an online report from somewhere that was another citizen here on the north side of chicago who saw this & had written his sighting on an online reporting site..... again, i was 52 at the time.......Neither a non believer or a believer.....[ never really thought about it].......But what i saw  on a cloudless sunny day......Were ufo's.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Clear sky sunny day no clouds

content.detailedDescription: I saw an object going south over philadelphia with a red and green light slightly pulsing. i viewed this from northeast philadelphia at around 9:300pm and then again about 11pm. what caught my attention was this object was going the opposite direction of a flight path. then i noticed no strobe lights at all, just a red and green light. these lights were not lights on wing tips of an airplane. the lights were bigger and pulsing. the object stopped many times and went a little to the left then stopped and went north. as it went by i had binoculars on it and i saw a white light on the back end and the red and green also. the object then disappeared over the roof tops. the second event at 11pm i looked over my roof and saw the same object hovering just below the clouds. i had my binoculars on the object for about 15 minutes and cold see the red and green lights still pulsing. the object then began moving after 15 minutes of hovering a little left and right but staying in the same area then slowly started to move south again and i watched until it disappeared over the skyline. the second time i saw the object it seemed higher than the first sighting. i'm a sky watcher and this was not a plane or a helicopter. if anyone else saw this i would love to hear from you. thanks
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Twice my wife and i observered this object at two different times in the same night
